level.heading: APPLICABILITY (ยง 19-2000) This chapter applies to applicants for and holders of licenses to participate inoxing, wrestling, or kickboxing events, professional or amateur, in theistrict of Columbia. Chapters 21 (Boxing Events), 22 (Wrestling Events), and 23Kickboxing Events) of this title supplement this chapter.
AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is section 7f the District of Columbia Boxing and Wrestling Commission Act of 1975, D.C.aw 1-20, D.C. Code ยง 3-606

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 22 DCR 5265 (March 31, 1976); asuperseded by Final Rulemaking published at 35 DCR 3710 (May 20, 1988)
